trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> row.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> rad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> row represents a single data item in a bound data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>rad representerer et enkelt element i en bundet datakilde.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Each row contains one cell per column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, and each cell displays a single value in the bound data item.
trans-unit.target: Hver rad inneholder én celle per kolonne i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, og hver celle viser én verdi i det bundne dataelementet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row within a set of alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen i raden i et sett med skiftende rader.

trans-unit.source: Alternating rows are rows to which you can assign different characteristics, such as alternating background colors.
trans-unit.target: Skiftende rader er rader som kan tilordnes ulike egenskaper, for eksempel ulike bakgrunnsfarger.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to indicate the number of rows within a set of alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>for det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>til å angi hvor mange rader i et sett med loddrette rader.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about alternating rows, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om skiftende rader, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A> method to respond to changes to the AlternationIndex property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A>metoden svarer på endringer i egenskapen AlternationIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.OnPropertyChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AlternationIndex property does not have its own property changed method because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AlternationIndex har ikke en egen endres egenskapsmetode fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty>feltet blir brukt for skrivebeskyttelse <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>felt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row within a set of alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden i et sett med loddrette rader.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The AlternationIndexProperty field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
trans-unit.target: Feltet AlternationIndexProperty blir brukt for skrivebeskyttelse <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>felt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the row.
trans-unit.target: Ordner innholdet i raden.

trans-unit.source: The area that is available for the row.
trans-unit.target: Området som er tilgjengelig for raden.

trans-unit.source: The actual area used by the row.
trans-unit.target: Faktiske området som brukes av raden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the details section of the row.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til å vise detaljer-delen i raden.

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to display the row details section or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
trans-unit.target: Malen som brukes til å vise raden Detaljer delen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template selector that provides custom logic for choosing a row details template.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en mal velger som gir tilpassede logikken for å velge en mal for rad detaljer.

trans-unit.source: A template selector for choosing the row details template.
trans-unit.target: En mal velger for å velge malen rad detaljer.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplateSelector*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates when the details section of the row is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir når detaljdelen om raden vises.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the visibility of the row details.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir synligheten for rad detaljene.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the row's data item within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen for den raden dataelement i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row's data item, or -1 if the item was not found.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den raden dataelement eller -1 Hvis elementet ikke ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> som inneholder det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: An element contained in a row to be found.
trans-unit.target: Et element i en rad som skal finnes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> that contains the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> som inneholder det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the row header contents.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som representerer rad overskrift innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The row header contents.
trans-unit.target: Raden hodet innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the row header.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen som brukes ved gjengivelse av radoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for a row header, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader>.
trans-unit.target: For å definere en <xref:System.Windows.Style>for en radoverskrift, angir du en <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridRowHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Style> can be applied to all row headers, or to an individual row header.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Style>kan brukes til alle radoverskriftene, eller til en enkelt radoverskrift.</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: To apply a <xref:System.Windows.Style> to an individual header set the HeaderStyle property, which takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Style>til et enkelt hode egenskapen HeaderStyle, som overstyrer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: The style that is used when rendering the row header.
trans-unit.target: Stilen som brukes ved gjengivelse av radoverskriften.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om raden er i modus for redigering.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> is a placeholder for a new item or for an item that has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> er en plassholder for et nytt element eller et element som ikke er lagret.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> is a placeholder for a new item or for an item that has not been committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> er en plassholder for et nytt element eller et element som ikke er utført; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien [avhengighet egenskapen verdien prioriteten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Called to update the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kall til å oppdatere den viste cells når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samlingen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.

trans-unit.source: The event data from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata fra den <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> hendelsen til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridRowAutomationPeer"></xref> for this row.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridRowAutomationPeer"> </xref> for denne raden.

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer for this row.
trans-unit.target: En ny automation node for denne raden.

trans-unit.source: Called when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>-egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Updates the displayed cells when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer den viste cells når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>egenskapsverdien er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.target: Forrige verdi i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*> property.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Item*>

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref> has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveres når gjeldende verdi for en avhengighetsegenskap i denne <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref> er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnPropertyChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den bestemte avhengighetsegenskapen som endret rapporteres i parameteren argumenter.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to respond to changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr denne metoden for å svare på endringer i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A> property does not have its own property changed method because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> field reuses the read-only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> field.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>har sin egen endres egenskapsmetoden fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty>feltet blir brukt for skrivebeskyttelse <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName>felt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndexProperty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndexProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.AlternationIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata som beskriver egenskapen endres, i tillegg gamle og nye verdier.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> property value changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"> </xref> hendelsen når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>egenskapsverdien endres til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnSelected method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSelected kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata, som er tom når denne metoden kalles av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the control's template changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når kontrollens malen endres.

trans-unit.source: The old template.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle malen.

trans-unit.source: The new template.
trans-unit.target: Den nye malen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*> property value changes to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"> </xref> hendelsen når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>egenskapsverdien endres til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnUnselected method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnUnselected kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The event data, which is empty when this method is called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata, som er tom når denne metoden kalles av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når raden er merket.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>egenskapsverdien endres til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Selected"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the row selection is cleared.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når raden utvalget er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A> property value changes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>egenskapsverdien endres til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.Unselected"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til å angi visuelt en feil i raden validering.

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to visually indicate an error in row validation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> setting.
trans-unit.target: Malen som brukes til å angi en feil i raden validering visuelt eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien, kan du se <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.ValidationErrorTemplate*>
